titleStmt.title: The full and last relation, of all things concerning Basing-House: with divers other passages; represented to to [sic] Mr. Speaker, and divers members in the House. By Mr. Peters, who came from Lieutenant generall Cromwell. Also, how there are strange and hideous cries, heard in the ground. Commanded to be printed, and published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
